Maria Alexeyevna Lvova-Belova ( Russian , amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise na Ọktoba 1984) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke bụ onye bụ Kọmishọna Onye isi ala maka ikike ụmụaka na Rọshịa.
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Penza, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na A
Arkhangelsky College of Culture and Arts n'afọ 2002 dị ka onye nduzi. Site na 2000 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi guitar na ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu ụmụaka na Penza
Lvova-Belova bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nke nzukọ ọha na eze mpaghara Penza maka ịkwalite mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya "Blagovest"

N'afọ 2011–14 na n'ime afọ 2017–19 ọ bụ onye otu Civic Chamber nke Penza Oblast, n'otu oge ahụ na 2017–19 onye otu Civic Chamber nke Russian Federation. N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke isi ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara All-Russia People's Front.
Nà 2019, Lvova-Belova sonyeere n'otu United Russia party (onye isi ala Dmitry Medvedev nyere ya kaadị ID n'ọnwa Nọvemba 23)
N'ọnwa Nọvemba abalị irí abụọ na inọ, a họpụtara ya na Presidium nke General Council of the United Russia, ọ ghọkwara onye isi oche nke otu na-arụ ọrụ iji kwado ọha mmadụ

N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2020, a họpụtara gọvanọ nke Penza Oblast Ivan Belozertsev họpụtara Lvova-Belova dị ka onye otu Federation Council of Russia site na ngalaba ndị isi nke Penza Oblast. Mgbe ntuli aka nke 2021 gasịrị, Oleg Melnichenko họpụtara ya ọzọ.

Na abalị irí ná asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021, onye isi ala Russia bụ Vladimir Putin họpụtara Senator Maria Lvova-Belova dị ka Kọmishọna gọọmentị etiti maka ikike ụmụaka, otu ọnwa mgbe kọmishọna gara aga bụ Anna Kuznetsova ghọrọ onye omeiwu.
Maria Lvova-Belova lụrụ di site n'afọ 2003 ma nwekwaa ụmụ ise bú nkè yá na ụmụ iri na asaa ọ́ nakweere. Di ya bụ Pavel Kogelman bụ onye ụkọchukwu nke Chọọchị Ọtọdọks nke Russia ma bụrụbu onye mmemme.
